loadParticleClass

  • loadParticleClass(spec: ParticleSpec): Promise<Particle>

  • Inherited from Loader.loadParticleClass

    • Defined in src/runtime/loader.ts:120

    Returns a particle class implementation by loading and executing the code defined by a particle. In the following example x.js will be loaded and executed:

    Particle foo in 'x.js'
